topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Viewing Interface Profiles

body.p: An interface profile is a named configuration of Ethernet ports and interfaces on a host, as follows:
body.note: This feature applies only to KVM region servers.
body.p:
To view hardware profles:
Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Inventory tab.
Click the Memory Profiles tables.
A list the currently defined Interface profiles displays, including the following information:
Ethernet Ports The list of physical Ethernet ports that have been allocated to connect to a network.
Interfaces Logical L2 interfaces defined on top of physical Ethernet ports.
For more information on how to create interface profiles, see Working with Interface Profiles.
